project.name: vibe-agency v1.0 Architecture Refactoring
project.core_problem: Research agents with tools (GAD-003) are incomplete - multi-turn tool use loop not implemented. Documentation contradictions and lack of tests prevent verification. v1.0 focuses on making research agents functional.
project.target_users: Developers and AI assistants using vibe-agency for software project planning
project.lead_architect_review: APPROVED WITH MODIFICATIONS - Raw specs refined based on technical analysis. Deferred arch_001/arch_002 to v2.0 (YAGNI). Reprioritized arch_007 as critical blocker. Increased complexity estimates based on actual code analysis.
project.review_verdict: v1.0 focus: Make research agents work. Architecture perfection deferred to v2.0.

features.name: Complete tool use loop (Anthropic native API)
features.lead_architect_notes: CRITICAL BLOCKER - Reprioritized from 'should_have' to MUST_HAVE. Complexity increased from 5 to 13 points based on technical analysis. This is THE v1.0 blocker - without functional research agents, everything else is irrelevant.

input.example: Multi-turn conversation: request → tool_use → execute tool → TOOL_RESULT → repeat until stop
input.constraints: Must work with real Anthropic API, must handle multi-turn conversations, must format tool results correctly
input.technical_reality: Current vibe-cli._execute_prompt() (lines 234-267) only handles single request/response. NO tool use handling.

processing.description: Implement Anthropic SDK native tool use: (1) Load tool definitions from tool_definitions.yaml, (2) Convert YAML to Anthropic tool schema (JSON), (3) Implement multi-turn loop (while stop_reason == 'tool_use'), (4) Execute tools via tool_executor.py, (5) Format results as Anthropic tool_result content blocks, (6) Handle errors (rate limits, invalid tools, timeouts)

output.format: Working multi-turn tool use loop + end-to-end test
output.example: Research agent with google_search completes workflow: prompt → search → analyze results → search again → final answer
output.success_criteria: test_tool_use_e2e.py passes with real Anthropic API. Research agents (MARKET_RESEARCHER, TECH_RESEARCHER) functional. GAD-003 marked as COMPLETE.

required.reason: Official Anthropic Python SDK for native tool use API
YAML definitions for google_search and web_fetch tools
Convert tool_definitions.yaml to Anthropic's JSON tool schema format
While loop that continues until stop_reason != 'tool_use'

fae_validation.lead_architect_override: Original FAE estimate (3-4 hours) was too optimistic. Increased to 2-3 days based on: (1) Multi-turn conversation loop complexity, (2) YAML to JSON schema conversion, (3) Error handling requirements, (4) End-to-end testing needs.

technical_breakdown.step_1: Add _load_tools_for_agent(agent_name) - reads tool_definitions.yaml, filters to agent's tools
technical_breakdown.step_2: Add _convert_yaml_to_anthropic_schema(yaml_tools) - converts to Anthropic's JSON format
technical_breakdown.step_3: Modify _execute_prompt() - add tools parameter to messages.create()
technical_breakdown.step_5: Add _execute_tools(tool_use_blocks) - calls tool_executor.py for each tool
technical_breakdown.step_6: Add _format_tool_result(tool_name, result) - creates Anthropic tool_result content block
technical_breakdown.step_7: Error handling - rate limits, network failures, invalid tool calls, timeouts
technical_breakdown.step_8: End-to-end test - test_tool_use_e2e.py with real Anthropic API

features.name: Add critical architecture tests (pytest infrastructure)
features.lead_architect_notes: Focus on CRITICAL tests first (tool use, state machine, VIBE_ALIGNER). Comprehensive coverage deferred to v1.1. Effort increased from 2-4 days to 4-6 days to be realistic about 3 complex test types.

input.constraints: Must verify arch_007 works end-to-end. Must cover state machine transitions. Must validate VIBE_ALIGNER workflow.

processing.description: Create 3 CRITICAL tests: (1) test_tool_use_e2e.py - verifies research agents with tools work end-to-end with real API, (2) test_orchestrator_state_machine.py - verifies PLANNING → CODING → TESTING transitions and error loops, (3) test_vibe_aligner_e2e.py - verifies Tasks 01-06 complete and generate feature_spec.json. DEFER to v1.1: comprehensive coverage, all artifact validation, GitHub Actions CI/CD.

output.example: pytest tests/test_tool_use_e2e.py tests/test_orchestrator_state_machine.py tests/test_vibe_aligner_e2e.py - all pass
output.success_criteria: Test infrastructure in place, arch_007 verified working, state machine verified correct, VIBE_ALIGNER workflow proven functional

required.reason: Must implement tool use loop BEFORE we can test it
Test framework for writing and running tests
End-to-end test: MARKET_RESEARCHER with google_search completes workflow with real API

features.name: Make API mode optional flag (clarify operator vs API mode)
features.lead_architect_notes: Removed arch_001 dependency - this is a trivial CLI flag addition. Clarifies that vibe-cli.py (manual prompt generation) is 'operator mode' and vibe-cli (delegated execution) is 'API mode'. No refactoring needed, just documentation and flag.

input.constraints: Default must be operator mode (manual prompt generation primary), API is fallback only

processing.description: Add --mode {operator|api} CLI argument to vibe-cli.py, default to operator mode (manual prompt generation), add help text explaining: operator = generate prompts for Claude Code (manual), api = automated with Anthropic API (requires ANTHROPIC_API_KEY)

output.example: ./vibe-cli.py generate VIBE_ALIGNER 02 --mode operator (default), ./vibe-cli.py generate VIBE_ALIGNER 02 --mode api (requires API key)
output.success_criteria: Mode selection clear, operator mode is default, API mode requires ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, clear error messages when API key missing

required.reason: Default behavior should be operator mode (manual prompt generation), API is optional
Clear documentation in --help about when to use each mode

fae_validation.lead_architect_override: Removed arch_001 dependency - this feature is independent and trivial. No refactoring of vibe-cli needed, just a CLI flag addition.

clarification.operator_mode: vibe-cli.py generates prompts → saves to COMPOSED_PROMPT.md → user copies to Claude Code (MANUAL)
clarification.api_mode: vibe-cli (no .py) launches orchestrator → monitors STDOUT → calls Anthropic API automatically (AUTOMATED)
clarification.note: These are ALREADY separate tools (different files). This feature just adds clarity via --mode flag.

features.name: Dogfood VIBE_ALIGNER on vibe-agency (meta)
features.lead_architect_notes: SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETED - This meta-exercise validated VIBE_ALIGNER workflow. FAE caught arch_003 (plugins) correctly. FDG revealed implementation dependencies. APCE calculated complexity. However, some estimates were optimistic (arch_007) and some features should have been caught as YAGNI (arch_001, arch_002). Overall: Strong validation of framework, with room for calibration improvement.

validation_insights.fae_effectiveness: Blocked arch_003 (plugins) correctly as YAGNI. Saved 1-2 weeks. However, missed arch_001 and arch_002 as YAGNI violations.
validation_insights.fdg_effectiveness: Identified implementation order and dependencies. Revealed arch_004 as critical path. Correctly flagged no circular dependencies.
validation_insights.apce_effectiveness: Calculated complexity scores. Total (36 pts) was reasonable but some individual estimates were optimistic (arch_007: 5 pts vs 13 pts reality).
validation_insights.workflow_validation: VIBE_ALIGNER task order (Education → Extraction → Feasibility → Gaps → Negotiation → Output) successfully prevented major scope issues. FAE/FDG/APCE provide valuable guardrails.
validation_insights.meta_success: Using VIBE_ALIGNER on vibe-agency architecture proves framework works for refactoring tasks, not just user-facing features.

scope_negotiation.timeline_pessimistic: 2.0 weeks (if arch_007 takes longer or API issues)
v1_exclusions: arch_001 (Separate vibe-cli concerns): YAGNI - current code is clean. Defer to v2.0. Saves 1-2 days.
arch_002 (Clarify orchestrator role): Tool execution already separated. Defer to v2.0. Saves 2-3 days.
arch_003 (Modularize research agents - plugins): FAE-013 YAGNI violation. Research agents not yet functional. Build extensibility AFTER proving core value. Saves 1-2 weeks. Deferred to v2.0.

Focus v1.0 on ONE goal: Make research agents functional (GAD-003 completion).

validation_notes.fae: Task 03 validated all features. arch_003 correctly blocked for YAGNI (FAE-013). Lead architect review identified arch_001 and arch_002 as additional YAGNI violations - FAE calibration can be improved.
validation_notes.fdg: Task 04 identified implementation order and gaps. Lead architect reversed order to fix blocker first (arch_007 → arch_004 instead of arch_004 → arch_007).
validation_notes.apce: Task 05 calculated complexity scores. Lead architect increased arch_007 from 5 to 13 points based on technical code analysis. APCE calibration can be improved for complex integration tasks.
validation_notes.dogfooding: Using VIBE_ALIGNER on itself validated the framework. FAE/FDG/APCE provide valuable guardrails but benefit from architect review for calibration.
validation_notes.lead_architect_verdict: APPROVED WITH MODIFICATIONS. Raw specs provide excellent foundation. Refinements focus v1.0 on core goal: Make research agents functional. Architecture perfection deferred to v2.0.
